i logged in to tell you this torrent IS LEGIT. the only problem is you might get BSOD a couple of times...its gonna restart like a dozen times within installation up to cracking the game especially after mounting dvd 4...you can avoid this by after installing, copy the contents of dvd 4 to a different location and delete the .iso or store in flash drive or something. 

dont forget to disable fire wall and antivirus and unplug the network cable before installing then after installing and cracking go to the fire wall advanced setting, inbound rules, look for max payne 3 and block all 4 programs. 

1. unplug net cable, disable antivirus and fire wall

2.place dvd4 in a different location then mount, then copy its contents again in a diff. location this serves as a back up for the crack and patches. this is also to avoid frequent BSOD and restarts.

3.mount the files and install

4.delete the iso files or just get it out of your HD

5.open the dvd4 where you transferred it and do the patching and cracking procedures
